name: Knight's Quest
overview: An 80 Column screen mode C128 game published in Issue #12 of Loadstar 128 in 1991. The game is modeled on a typical RPG turn based game, but with a couple of twists. First of all, it can be played as a two-player game. Each player has their own character to play in the adventure. In Jon's game instructions, he kind of likens this idea to a two player board game; kind of like King Arthur meets Monopoly. There's also a real-time jousting “mini game” that you take part at certain times during your adventure.
